title: From king to congress
creator_credit: Billy James Parrott and Guggenheim Productions
brief_description: Shows the campaign of Andrew Young, a black man running for the U.S. House of Representatives from Atlanta, Georgia. Young was associated with the late Martin Luther King. Young, and his opponent, a politically moderate white, are shown campaigning and debating issues. Supporters of each and the work involved is illustrated as well as comments by supporters and others.
